description: A sonusDsx3AdminChangeNotification trap indicates the DS3 administration
changes.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDsx3AdminChangeNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDs3AdmnState i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDsx3AdminChangeNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDs3AdmnState i 2 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: A sonusDsx3OutOfServiceNotification trap indicates that a DS3
went out of service. The reason indicates the reason why and
type indicates the type of failure.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDsx3OutOfServiceNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDs3OutOfServiceReason i 1 SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDs3OutOfServiceType i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: A sonusDsx3ThresholdCrossingNotification trap indicates that a DS3
threshold has been crossed. The type indicates the type of threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDsx3ThresholdCrossingNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-DS3-MIB::sonusDs3ThresholdType i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: A sonusDsx3LineStatusChangeNotification trap indicates the DS3 state changes.
It is used to notify DS3 Alarms states
